title: League Chat wont connect
body: So im trying to play some games with a few friends but my league chat wont connect so i dont have a friends list and im also not able to message of receive messages either. I have tried to google some fixes but i have come up with nothing. anyone know how to fix this issue??

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
